attributes.action: STOP the Government wasting over 100 million pounds on BREXIT advertising!
attributes.additional_details: Look at this recent article by the BBC...it says it all. https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-49545743
attributes.background: It has been reported that the campaign to 'explain' to people what to do, "if anything" when BREXIT arrives could cost as much as £100m! Please sign this petition for them to cancel all advertising campaigns about BREXIT as it will prove to be an utter waste of money....AGAIN (Like HS2).
